full_content.content:
Frequently Asked QuestionsWhat types of cooktops does Sears Home Services repair?We repair a wide variety of cooktops, including both electric and gas models.
Sears Home Services handle glass cooktop repairs, standard electric cooktop repairs, and gas cooktop repairs for top brands like Frigidaire, Whirlpool, Maytag, Bosch, Kenmore, and many others.Can Sears Home Services fix my cooktop if I didn’t buy it from Sears?Yes! Sears Home Services repairs cooktops from all major brands, regardless of where you purchased it. We provide expert repair services for cooktops from brands such as Whirlpool, Bosch, Frigidaire, Maytag, and more.How can I prevent costly cooktop repairs?Regular maintenance is key to preventing costly breakdowns and extending the life of your cooktop.
Sears Home Services offers annual appliance maintenance services to keep your cooktop in top shape and operating efficiently.What should I do if my cooktop is malfunctioning?When your cooktop is malfunctioning, it's best to schedule a service with a Sears Home Services technician. We offer flexible scheduling and have over 1,500 manufacturer-trained technicians who can quickly diagnose and repair your cooktop.Ready to schedule your service? Contact us today to book an appointment with our expert technicians.
We Have Local Technicians in Your Area
Whether you’re looking for cooktop repair near me for an electric or gas built-in cooktop, Sears Home Services has the best local repair technicians to serve you. We have thousands of cooktop repair technicians across the US who are thoroughly trained and highly skilled in fixing all types and brands of cooktops.
We have local pros in your neighborhood for glass cooktop repair and standard electric cooktop repair. When you need stove top repair, trust the #1 provider in the service industry to fix the problem fast.
When searching for gas cooktop repair near me, you'll find a Sears technician in your area to fix your gas cooktop quickly. We service top brands such as Frigidaire, Whirlpool, Maytag, Bosch and Kenmore, no matter where you bought it.
Regular maintenance of your cooktop can help prevent costly breakdowns and extend its life. Keep your cooktop operating safely and efficiently by scheduling yearly appliance maintenance service.
Find the parts and accessories you need to keep your cooktop in top shape at Sears PartsDirect.

Took his time and was very niceSepehr S, Potomac, MDDecember 31, 2025Worked on StovetopDid a great job and he was polite, respectful, helpful.Brenda B, Waycross, GADecember 29, 2025Service on Stove topNice guy. 
Very polite and knowledgeable. 
Got my stove fixed quickly. 
Because of having to originally deal with an AI and not a person, extra parts were ordered that were not needed. 
Do not like having to deal with a robot with texting what is wrong with an appliance!!Joanette G, Angier, NCDecember 29, 2025Roger is awesomeRoger is very knowledgeable and very kind. He made sure not to scratch anything and got the job done quick. Thanks, Roger!!Meghan T, Sioux Falls, SDDecember 28, 2025Excellent ServiceI appreciate Miguel's kindness to understand that we needed the oven fixed before Christmas Day.Jenni E, Poplar Grove, ILDecember 24, 2025Knowledgeable and DetailedExplained the issue and what is covered vs not and what could have caused the issue.Ashish S, Brentwood, TNDecember 24, 2025Great customer serviceGreat customer service very nice and well trained very promptTeresa K, Beloit, WIDecember 24, 2025Great work!Randall did a great job and gave good advice on how best to maintain my stove top.  I am very grateful!Kathy K, Makawao, HIDecember 24, 2025Stove issue.Very timely, very friendly, explained things he was doing and gave advice.Rondea M, Topeka, KSDecember 24, 2025AHSPleasant, knowledgeable and efficient   AHS is a great partner. Have had them for 21 years.Ellenjack J, Kingsport, TNDecember 23, 2025ProfessionalismTom was very professional and caring. Thank you for taking care of our problem as quickly as you didA W, Egg Harbor Township, NJDecember 23, 2025Oven Service TechnicianDaniel was highly professional, very knowledgeable and thoroughly polite and engaging.Michael E, Winchester, VADecember 22, 2025Range repairMy range has a new brain now. Thomas was great and knew what he was doing. I didn't even know Sears still had Repair specialists. Hopefully I won't need any work for another 20 years.Barbara S, Olathe, KSDecember 22, 2025Oven not working on the Range.Andy was very pleasant and friendly, he came into the house and went straight to work after asking about the problem with our range. He found the problem with a burned wire that cause all our problems. Thank you for all your good work.Junior M, Bushkill, PADecember 22, 2025RecommendThanks for fixing my range.  He was awesome calling me letting me know his arrival time ordered the parts and repaired it with now problems.Pheobie H, Pensacola, FLDecember 22, 2025Great Job!Daniel did an extraordinary job installing the new parts. He was punctual arriving at the time he estimated, and was prompt in correcting the issue. He was extremely professional and efficient.John G, Rolesville, NCDecember 22, 2025George was excellent technicianGeorge ordered the right parts to get the job done in efficient manner. He was courteous and professional. Thanks much.Neelam C, Pompano Beach, FLDecember 22, 2025Fisher Paykel Induction CooktopRaymond was a pleasure to work with.  He gave some very insightful information about our new cooktop.  If I need service again, I'm surely going to ask for Raymond.  In my opinion, he came right away and handled the problem expeditiously.   I'm so glad I called Sears.Sue M, Gulfport, MSDecember 19, 2025

full_content.content: Glossary TermsWhat is a Convection Range?A convection range is a kitchen appliance that features a convection oven, which uses a fan and exhaust system to circulate hot air around the food, resulting in faster, more even cooking and baking compared to conventional ovens.What is a Drop-In Range?A drop-in range is a type of kitchen stove that is designed to be fitted into a pre-existing space in kitchen cabinetry, mounted on a platform, flanked by cabinetry, and often featuring a custom panel at the bottom.What is a Dual Fuel Range?A dual fuel range combines the precision of an electric oven with the responsiveness of a gas cooktop, offering the best of both worlds for cooking enthusiasts.What is BTU?BTU, or British Thermal Unit, measures the amount of heat required to raise the temperature of one pound of water by one degree Fahrenheit.
